snippet.title: The Saga of Erik the Viking Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the ZX Spectrum game, The Saga of Erik the Viking. A 1984 text adventure from Level 9 based on Terry Jones' children's book of the same name. The location number shown at the top right corresponds with the number on the game map at http://maps.speccy.cz/map.php?id=SagaofEriktheViking . From the recording originally sent by Hippy Smith to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ .

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
